flawed_nl_solution:
There are 80/100 * 2300 = <<80/100*2300=11500/4>>11500/4 books in English at the library.
Out of these books, only 60/100 * 11500/4 = <<60/100*11500/4=1725>>1725 were published inside the country.
So there are 11500/4 - 1725 = <<11500/4-1725=1150>>1150 books in English published outside of the country.
#### 1150

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1840, not 11500/4. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
